title: november 21: up in the air (over paris)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia charts the path of the first hot air balloon, which flew over Paris in 1783. Afterwards, she talks about one of Elvis’s first breaks in the recording industry. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
